benchmark_details.name: PandasPlotBench
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces the human-curated Pandas-PlotBench dataset, designed to evaluate language models’ effectiveness as assistants in visual data exploration. Our benchmark focuses on generating code for visualizing tabular data—such as a Pandas DataFrame—based on natural language instructions, complementing current evaluation tools and expanding their scope.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess AI models as assistants in visual data exploration.

data.annotation: Tasks generated with the help of OpenAI GPT-4V.

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on the adherence of generated plots to task descriptions and visual fidelity.
methodology.interpretation: A score of 75 or higher is considered acceptable performance.
methodology.validation: Models were evaluated multiple times to ensure robustness.
